metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35789 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the C AMQP client library (aka rabbitmq-c)through 0.13.0 for RabbitMQ. Credentials can only be entered on the commandline (e.g., for amqp-publish or amqp-consume) and are thus visible to localattackers by listing a process and its arguments.

criterions.comment: librabbitmq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
